description:
Free logical board game for all ages Break a Code. A variant of popular game Mastermind.
Challenge yourself and your abilities to solve ciphers. An excellent educational game for children and adults.

In this game, you have to solve the computer-generated code with a certain number of moves.
Why would you like this game?
- A large selection of levels and complex combinations for experienced players
- The ability to play a quick occasional game
- Compete with yourself and get the best level time
- A great tool to relax when your brain is overstressed
- “Bulls and Cows” maniacs will enjoy this version of the game with a nice interface
name: Mastermind Code
